thread.title: Watch JD Crowe talk about Kardashians and cartoonists
thread.title_full: Watch JD Crowe talk about Kardashians and cartoonists

author: J.D. Crowe | jdcrowe@al.com
title: Watch JD Crowe talk about Kardashians and cartoonists
text:
Watch JD Crowe talk about Kardashians and cartoonists Endangered species J.D. Crowe talks about editorial cartoonists and Kardashians Comments 
Y'all may find this disturbing, but sometimes I get invited to schools to talk to kids. 
Not sure why. Maybe it's because I'm considered an endangered species. Or maybe I'm being used as kind of a Scared Straight program to steer kids away from journalism. 
Either way, I love my job. But my heart hurts for some of those kids. 
Check out more stuff and junk from JD Crowe
